overview:
Shawn Lattanzio has been an IT professional for 20 years and specializes in addressing your needs as a computer user whether you use your computer at home or at your business.Shawn does computer repair for Windows Computers and also designs web sites for individuals and businesses.
  Shawn realizes how important it is that every business,no matter how small,has their own web site.And with that mentality,What his company charges for a web site is very small compared to what most other firms charge.
